So you´re looking for a perfect fitting vps...because f.e. you don´t need 100GB storage, 4GB RAM or something else...

We have provided an almost unique service for this...now available abroad:

customizable VPS!

The whole thing already from 3,79 EUR (4,77USD) per month, 1 month duration of contract and no setup costs!

From 128MB RAM to 128GB*, 1 CPU core up to 32 * ... You can manage and customize your own VPS, to your exact needs!

So you pay us only what you really need!

The following basic features are always included:

* hardware virtualization via KVM (no pseudo-virtualization via openVZ etc.)
* High-performance and extremely redundant server hardware by Thomas Krenn.AG with at least 128GB of RAM and AMD dual processors 16Core!
* High-availability storage cluster system for storage management
* 99.9% guaranteed availability of host systems!
* Datacenter located in Frankfurt/Main
* Complete flexibility in configuring your VM
* Hardware parameters can be up- or downgraded
* Web interface with a lot of functions like rescue, start / stop and re-install, rDNS etc
* accurate traffic accounting for your VPS (ideal for resellers!)
* TUN / TAP devices possible for PPTP
* 10GiB backup space free
* Private VLANs / Back Nets possible
* a lot of OS available from ArchLinux up to pfSense firewall, or Windows Server
* Test-IP: 109.75.188.1

Just have a look on our [individual vps configurator](http://www.de-punkt.de/vserver.html?pk_campaign=post-let-020812)
